CREATE_ARABIC_MAGIC_SQUARE: Create magic square in Arabic numerals
BASTET_PROMPT_REPETITION: Please enter the repetition amount (positive integer):
BASTET_RESULT: Bastet result for number {number} with {repetition} repetitions using table {table} is {value}.
HUDDAM_RESULT: Generated name for number {number} (type: {type}, language: {huddam_lang}) is '{name}'.
HUDDAM_PROMPT_MULTIPLIAR: Multiplier letters are grouped in Mode 1, repeated for each digit in Mode 2

START_MESSAGE: Welcome to NumberFansBot! You have {remaining_credits} credits. Explore the magic of numbers!
HELP_MESSAGE:
Available conceptial commands:

/abjad - Calculate Abjad value
/huddam - Generate spiritual names
/unsur - Determine elemental affinity
/nutket - Spell numbers
/transliterate - Transliterate text
/language - Change language
/numerology - Calculate numerology value
/convertnumbers - Convert numbers of a script
/magicsquare - Generate magic square
/name - Generate or transliterate names

Bot commands

/credits View remaining credits
/payment - Purchase credits
/cancel - Cancel operation
/settings - Adjust settings
/help - Display this
/start Starts this bot

Shopping commands

/buy - buy products
/sell - sell products
/orders - view orders
/address - add, remove and list addresses
/password - sellers password settings
/papara - sellers payment helper settings

You can do more calculations using https://ebced.free.nf
NUMEROLOGY_USAGE: Usage: /numerology <text or phrase> [arabic_abjadi| arabic_maghribi| arabic_hija| arabic_maghribi_hija| hebrew| english| latin| turkish| ottoman] [normal| inverse| base36| base36_inverse| base100| base100_inverse]
NUMEROLOGY_RESULT: Numerology value of '{text}' using {alphabet} alphabet and {method} method is {value}.
PAYMENT_BETA_TESTER: As a beta tester, you have unlimited credits!
NO_CREDITS: You have no credits left. Use /payment to purchase more.
USER_BLACKLISTED: You are blacklisted and cannot use this bot.
BETA_TESTER_GRANTED: Beta tester privileges granted to Telegram ID {telegram_id}.
BETA_TESTER_REVOKED: Beta tester privileges revoked for Telegram ID {telegram_id}.
AI_PROMPT:
I am using a telegram bot which can calculate numerologic values depending on Turkish, English, Latin, Arabic and Hebrew Alphabets, I am trying to find a spritual awakining through results of this telegram bots calculations; bot is able to calculate gematric values and abjad kind of calculations using '/abjad' command; it is able to produce magic squares by '/magicsquare' command if finds a number value and can produce angel or demon names for spritual tulpa entities using '/huddam' command, the bot can convert easter arabic numbers and modern arabic numbers of a text to each other using '/convertnumbers' command and gave me the results below; please tell me how can I use these for scripting down a talesman or preparing a mandala or casting spells using them; the both can give limited information using its records on islamic abjad values but I hope you can add more ideas about its results here:

 {response}

To view product details, use the inline query format: {bot_username} product [ID]
For example: {bot_username} product 1

Or browse all products with: {bot_username} shop
UPDATE_PERMISSION_DENIED_DESC: You don't have permission to use shop update commands
UPDATE_PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE: You don't have permission to use shop update commands. Please contact the administrator.
UPDATE_COMMANDS_DESC: Available commands: new, sale, restock, announcement
UPDATE_COMMANDS_HELP:
Shop Update Commands:

• {bot_username} update new [product_name] - Announce a new product
• {bot_username} update sale [discount]% - Announce a sale
• {bot_username} update restock [product_id] - Announce a product restock
• {bot_username} update announcement [text] - Make a general announcement
UPDATE_SALE_FORMAT_MESSAGE:
Invalid sale format. Use: {bot_username} update sale [number]%
Example: {bot_username} update sale 20%
UPDATE_RESTOCK_FORMAT_MESSAGE:
Invalid restock format. Use: {bot_username} update restock [product_id]
Example: {bot_username} update restock 2
UPDATE_UNKNOWN_TYPE_DESC: Available types: new, sale, restock, announcement
UPDATE_NEW_PRODUCT_DESC: Announce a new product to the group
